name: ADRENACHROMATIC_STUDIES/002 'Makyō'
description:
Makyō, literally translated as Ghost Realm or Devil's Cave, is a metaphoric reference to self-delusion or illusion, but especially in reference to meditation practice; sensory distortions that can occur in the form of visions and perceptual distortions, sometimes described as 'going to the movies'.

The character Ma refers to a Trickster/Tempter archetype or Devil, Kyo can mean place, condition or world.

The illusory nature of this world, as enticing as it seems, is a fake empire built by and for you, The Emperor Without Clothes.

Limited series of 1/1 animations exploring dispersive and refractive effects, filtered through custom fx. Explosions of shifting color. Be a prism.

1080p HQ mp4 (80mb), 6 sec seamless loop
